meanings.sent1: The room was litten with a warm glow from the lamp.
meanings.sent2: The litten candle flickered softly in the dark room.
meanings.sent3: The litten lantern led the way through the spooky forest.
meanings.sent4: Her smile litten up the entire room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The litten stars twinkled in the night sky like diamonds.

meanings.sent1: The litten street was bustling with people and cars.
meanings.sent2: The litten windows of the house shone brightly in the evening.
meanings.sent3: The litten sign outside the store attracted many customers.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes litten up with excitement when she saw the surprise.
meanings.sent5: The litten path through the garden was enchanting in the moonlight.
